channel.title: Comments on: How to Fix The “SMS Keeps Loading” Problem on The MTN MiFi
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: CBNc Global
item.dc:creator: CBNc Global
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-fix-the-sms-keeps-loading-problem-on-the-mtn-mifi/#comment-1391">Fred</a>.
You have to reset the mifi to be able to access the SMS, remove the back cover of the device, use a pin to press and hold the reset button until the light flashes in correspondence, then you can be able to access your SMS.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fred.

You have to reset the mifi to be able to access the SMS, remove the back cover of the device, use a pin to press and hold the reset button until the light flashes in correspondence, then you can be able to access your SMS.

item.title: By: Joe
item.dc:creator: Joe
item.description: Finally! The older version of the app wasn't installing on my phone, but it just worked now. Almost discarded my router cos of this issue.
item.content:encoded: Finally! The older version of the app wasn’t installing on my phone, but it just worked now. Almost discarded my router cos of this issue.
